sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng shìxiān tōngzhī wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me prévenir à l'avance.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please inform me in advance.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā huì shuō sān zhǒng yǔyán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il parle trois langues.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He can speak three languages.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū de nèiróng hěn yǒuqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le contenu de ce livre est très intéressant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The content of this book is very interesting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī běn xīn bǐjìběn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté un nouveau cahier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a new notebook.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān yǒudiǎn lěng, bùguò hái hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait un peu froid aujourd'hui, mais ça va.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's a bit cold today, but it's okay.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们不能总是依靠别人。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bù néng zǒngshì yīkào biérén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous ne pouvons pas toujours compter sur les autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We can't always rely on others.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā měitiān tīng guǎngbō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il écoute la radio tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He listens to the radio every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī píng kuàngquánshuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi une bouteille d'eau minérale, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a bottle of mineral water.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wèilái de fāzhǎn qūshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est la tendance de développement future.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is the future development trend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Ràng wǒ sīkǎo yīxià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Laissez-moi réfléchir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let me think about it.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèngfǔ ānzhì le shòuzāi qúnzhòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gouvernement a relogé les sinistrés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The government relocated the disaster victims.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī chēngzàn le tā de biǎoxiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a loué sa performance.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher praised his performance.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wàimiàn dǎléi le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il tonne dehors.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's thundering outside.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dìmiàn shàng yǒu hěn duō luòyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de feuilles mortes sur le sol.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many fallen leaves on the ground.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié fán wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne m'embête pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't bother me.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们不能忽视这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bù néng hūshì zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous ne pouvons pas ignorer ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We cannot ignore this problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dìxià yǒu yī gè tíngchēchǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un parking souterrain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is an underground parking lot.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zuówǎn mèngjiàn le nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai rêvé de toi hier soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I dreamed of you last night.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi měinǚ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est une belle femme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a beautiful woman.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他经常出差进行商务活动。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīngcháng chūchāi jìnxíng shāngwù huódòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il voyage souvent pour des activités commerciales.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He often travels for business activities.
